c1.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
c1.descriptionRaw: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> is increased by 3s.
c1.description: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide is increased by 3s.

c2.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
c2.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.
c2.description: When Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

c3.name: Hunter's Supplication
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sentinel Oath
c4.descriptionRaw: Shortens the Hold CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.
c4.description: Shortens the Hold CD of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

c5.name: Heterochromatic Gaze
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Overflow
c6.descriptionRaw:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
c6.description:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals AoE Hydro DMG equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
